attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: we as a community are sickened to think this poor helpless baby was treated like this, to be interviewed countless times and even examined by social services and doctors is a disgrace, this poor baby was left to die a cruel unforgivable death. we want ALL involved to be sacked!! and the 3 people involved in hurting this baby to be punished!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
